attributes.action: Bring back the 10-packs cigarettes, 20-packs cause more smoking
attributes.additional_details: In theory we all believed that 20 packs minimum would help, but in reality and practice I’m %100 sure that 20 packs do not help. Please help smokers. There are millions people affected really badly. I believe the government wanted to stop young people starting smoking, but I don’t think this(20-packs) helps the situation either, ask any 10 teenagers you’ll see 9 of them are smokers. If they cannot afford to buy 20s(over £10) they may become violent,perhaps thats why the crime rates are crazy now
attributes.background: I used to smoke less because I would carry maximum 10 cigarettes at a time, now it’s 20 units and I smoke more and more, it affects my health badly, I spoke to many friends and family too, everyone says it’s been worse than before. Please bring back the 10 packs. Buy less, keep less and SMOKE LESS.

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Iain Duncan Smith MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Chingford and Woodford Green

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Dame Eleanor Laing MP
signatures_by_constituency.name: Epping Forest
